the Grand Labyrinth too, fellow adventurer?

and I wanted to share its wonders with the world.

I decided to express my passion

a bit like a real adventurer.

and I’ve got to gather more inspiration!

extra equipment just for times like this.

so I’ll even give it to you at cost!
